title: In the early 1950s a house next door exploded due to a road work gas leak. Two were killed. The street was Barnard Drive in Wilmington. I am looking for the newspaper article written at the time for family research. Can you help me. I have written before but got no answer. I can find nothing online about I am sure you covered it at the time. I remember the articles. Thank you.
text:
Our online archives do not go back to the 1950s. Copies of old
newspapers on microfilm are available at the local history room of the
New Hanover County public library main branch. If you know the date,
you can look it up there.
